channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Inside the daring escape of Venezuelan leader Machado to Norway, scripted by US Special Forces veteran
This Week in Explainers: Why Luthra brothers, owners of doomed Goa nightclub, are being deported from Thailand
Fact-check: Did Pakistan’s Shehbaz Sharif really gate-crash Putin's closed-door meeting?
History Today: When Parliament, India's seat of power, came under attack
Why India's Kolhapuri chappals will soon be sold in Prada stores worldwide
US approves first device to treat depression at home. Here’s how it works
How India’s position in America’s strategic calculus remains crucial but recalibrated
item.description: The latest US National Security Strategy retains India as an important Indo-Pacific partner—but the language today is more functional than visionary

item.title: Head-on | Pakistan’s genocide in Bangladesh had a hidden US hand
item.description: The CIA, notorious for its role in subversive acts globally, was in charge of the operation to save East Pakistan from liberation and provide an alibi for Islamabad’s genocide

item.title: How Trump’s targeting of Venezuela and South Africa appears supremacist
item.description: As part of an evolving design, the US-led West needs resources and is looking for issues and sacrificial lambs

item.title: How India-Russia ties are not Soviet-era nostalgia, but a necessity in a multipolar world
item.description: India’s ties with Russia have endured because they have evolved. The foundations have shifted from dependency to interdependence, from rhetoric to results

item.title: Why Tawang conference on Arunachal-born Dalai Lama sparked Beijing’s anxiety
item.description: China is today nervous that the 15th Dalai Lama can ‘return’ to Arunachal Pradesh, and not to occupied Tibet

item.title: Tanzania’s 2025 elections: When patronage politics meets popular revolt
item.description: This year’s elections in Tanzania have pushed the country into its most volatile political crisis in decades, exposing the limits of patronage politics amid a fierce youth-led uprising
